name: The Arcane Door [VR]
description:
The Arcane Door is a VR escape-room-style puzzle game created in Unity for use with HTC Vive. You will require a VR setup to play this game. It has only been tested with HTC Vive.

Your friend, Professor White, has gone missing. Out of concern you attend at his house to try to find a clue as to his whereabouts, however instead you find a trapdoor with a strange lock. Could there be a clue below as to where your friend has gone, or does a larger mystery await?

Uses roomscale with teleport movement, you should be able to play in a small environment so long as you have enough room that you can comfortably stand up, crouch down and extend your arms to reach for items/interact with objects and pick up objects off the floor etc.

Progress through the game should automatically save upon the completion of each room.
